hero.brief: SGMI Garages is a go to place for securing your future with job readiness in technology field. With our curated programmes equip yourself to attain skills that will speak for rest of your life

items.title: Vision
items.brief: The demand for UI UX Designers is increasing day by day. UI UX Job is ranked 6th on Glassdoor’s “Top 25 highest-paying entry-level jobs”. Everything is becoming digital in this era, which means most product or service-based companies require a UI UX Designer for their needs. That's why the demand & the average salary for a UI UX Designer are increasing every year.
